com.serotonin.mango.rt.maint

Class BackgroundProcessing

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.serotonin.mango.rt.maint.BackgroundProcessing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.serotonin.util.ILifecycle

    public class BackgroundProcessing
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.serotonin.util.ILifecycle
    A cheesy name for a class, i know, but it pretty much says it like it is. This class keeps an inbox of items to process, and oddly enough, processes them. (Oh, and removes them from the inbox when it's done.)
    Author:
    Matthew Lohbihler
